== API ==

1. Download and install the [http://code.google.com/appengine/downloads.html#Google_App_Engine_SDK_for_Python Google App Engine SDK for Python]


2. Checkout the source: `svn co http://lightning-app.googlecode.com/svn/api/trunk/`


3. Copy the file settings.py.example to settings.py: `cp settings.py.example settings.py`


4. Adjust the values inside settings.py
